name: Retro Apocalypse
description:
This is my first attempt at a game jam.

Retro Apocalypse was submitted for the "RETRO FPS Game Jam".


Gameplay

I am a big fan of the original DOOM and DOOM II games, and I grew up playing them all the time. While I didn't really spend much time developing a story for this game, I hoped to re-capture the fun I had with DOOM: quick-paced action, variety of weapons/enemies, finding secrets, and interesting level design.

Gameplay elements I knew I had to include for this game:

  • Fast movement
  • 90's style FPS artwork (DOOM, DukeNukem, Heretic, etc.)
  • Multi-color keycards to pass certain doors
  • Many levels, all with DOOM style cutscene endings (with player stats)
  • Increase level difficulty as each progress
  • Secret walls/rooms/actions

There are 5 levels in this game:

  1. Bunker
  2. Fortress
  3. Spider's Nest
  4. Farm Overrun
  5. The Execution - The final boss
Controls KEY BINDING
DESCRIPTIONWASDMove forward, left, back, right
MouseAim crosshair
Left click
Shoot weapon (+ can hold for the assault rifle)
Space
Open doors, and continuing at end of levels
1, 2, 3, or 4
Switch to weapon in corresponding slot (if available)


My Conclusion

I had a lot of fun making this game, I hope can you enjoy it too. I'm still fairly new to Unity, so I'm proud of the progress I was able to make in such a short timespan. I learned a lot with each new thing I decided to tweak to the game. If I had more time, I would have loved to add new weapons, enemies, and many of the badly needed enemy animations.

Thanks!
